original_title: Alas Kuwatro ng Madaling Araw at Gising Ka Pa
overview: Marcus and Gabriel are new found friends who are slowly exploring their mutual admiration for each other. They just get along really well. One night, Gabriel asks Marcus to go and grab some midnight snacks together. In the process they get to spend time talking and getting to know more about each other.
title: It's four o'clock in the morning and you're still awake
